From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: 12 November 2024 2:26 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Re: Claim Intimation - Insured: Allied Enterprises LLC (Chalhoub) - Insurer: GIG / Water Leakage Incident at Michael Kors, Dubai Mall - DOA: 25/09/2024 - Nasco claim# TBA

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Please find attached the additional details.

 

Adding the final quotation for the carpet replacement. Do not consider the below mentioned installation charges as we request Southern Interiors to install as their quotation is more competitive.



 

Floor Masters is the approved supplier for Michal Kors. We will only get the materials from Floor Masters and the installation will be done by Southern Interiors in order to reduce the overall cost.

 

CIVIL WORKS – Carpet Installation works: AED 2,470/-

chunks.text:
Floor Masters is the approved supplier for Michal Kors. We will only get the materials from Floor Masters and the installation will be done by Southern Interiors in order to reduce the overall cost.

 

CIVIL WORKS – Carpet Installation works: AED 2,470/-

CIVIL WORKS – Gypsum ceiling, walls & Door frame rectification works – AED 7,250/-

CIVIL WORKS – Carpet Installation works: AED 2,470/-

Carpet Material Cost  AED 19,800/-

ELECTRICAL SUPPLIES – Supply of ‘Lucent’ LED light & drivers AED 460/-

FIRE ALARM SUPPLIES– Supply of ‘2’ nos Smoke detectors’ AED 460/-

Less Deductible: AED 7,340/-

Net Claim: AED 23,100/-

 

As the claim amount is exceeding AED 20,000, if GIG would like to appoint a surveyor, we have no objection. However, we can confirm that no additional quotations will be submitted for consideration and the net claim will be more or less AED 23,000.


Please advise if GIG has any objection to the submitted invoices. If not, please advise if we may proceed with the carpet installation as the peak sales period is coming up and we need to finalize all rectification works before the start of December.

 

Thank you for your support and always and look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

________________________________

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

Subject: Claim Intimation - Water Leakage Incident at Michael Kors, Dubai Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Yogesh,

I hope this message finds you well.

Kindly note that a water leakage incident occurred at our Michael Kors store,  in Dubai Mall on September 25, 2024. The incident caused damage to the store’s ceiling, walls, flooring, lighting, and other fixtures. 

Kindly open a claim file under the Property Insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC.

As the policy deductible for water damage incidents has been raised to USD 2,000, I don't think you will need to assign a surveyor as the cost are not significantly above the threshold.

From: Hagop Ghazarian <Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com <mailto:Hagop.Ghazarian@chalhoub.com> >
Sent: 12 November 2024 2:26 PM
To: Hani Gebara <Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com <mailto:Hani.Gebara@nascodubai.com> >
Cc: Yogesh Naresh Patil <Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com <mailto:Yogesh.Patil@nascodubai.com> >
Subject: Re: Claim Intimation - Insured: Allied Enterprises LLC (Chalhoub) - Insurer: GIG / Water Leakage Incident at Michael Kors, Dubai Mall - DOA: 25/09/2024 - Nasco claim# TBA

 

Dear Hani,

 

Hope all is well.

 

Please find attached the additional details.

 

Adding the final quotation for the carpet replacement. Do not consider the below mentioned installation charges as we request Southern Interiors to install as their quotation is more competitive.



 

Floor Masters is the approved supplier for Michal Kors. We will only get the materials from Floor Masters and the installation will be done by Southern Interiors in order to reduce the overall cost.

 

CIVIL WORKS – Carpet Installation works: AED 2,470/-

chunks.text:
Floor Masters is the approved supplier for Michal Kors. We will only get the materials from Floor Masters and the installation will be done by Southern Interiors in order to reduce the overall cost.

 

CIVIL WORKS – Carpet Installation works: AED 2,470/-

CIVIL WORKS – Gypsum ceiling, walls & Door frame rectification works – AED 7,250/-

CIVIL WORKS – Carpet Installation works: AED 2,470/-

Carpet Material Cost  AED 19,800/-

ELECTRICAL SUPPLIES – Supply of ‘Lucent’ LED light & drivers AED 460/-

FIRE ALARM SUPPLIES– Supply of ‘2’ nos Smoke detectors’ AED 460/-

Less Deductible: AED 7,340/-

Net Claim: AED 23,100/-

 

As the claim amount is exceeding AED 20,000, if GIG would like to appoint a surveyor, we have no objection. However, we can confirm that no additional quotations will be submitted for consideration and the net claim will be more or less AED 23,000.


Please advise if GIG has any objection to the submitted invoices. If not, please advise if we may proceed with the carpet installation as the peak sales period is coming up and we need to finalize all rectification works before the start of December.

 

Thank you for your support and always and look forward to hearing from you.

 

Best Regards,

Hagop

 

________________________________

HAGOP GHAZARIAN​​​​

SPECIALIST ‑ ADMINISTRATION

M.C.T. FZE

DUBAI

‑

UNITED ARAB EMIRATES

+971 4 8045000

Subject: Claim Intimation - Water Leakage Incident at Michael Kors, Dubai Mall

 

!

EXTERNAL EMAIL
Do not click on links or attachments unless you recognize the sender and know that the content is safe.

 

Dear Yogesh,

I hope this message finds you well.

Kindly note that a water leakage incident occurred at our Michael Kors store,  in Dubai Mall on September 25, 2024. The incident caused damage to the store’s ceiling, walls, flooring, lighting, and other fixtures. 

Kindly open a claim file under the Property Insurance of Allied Enterprises LLC.

As the policy deductible for water damage incidents has been raised to USD 2,000, I don't think you will need to assign a surveyor as the cost are not significantly above the threshold.
